name: polaroid
description: It's a picture of this house. The view is from the street, and you recognize two of the trees from the front yard, but the third is missing.

verbInteractions.Flip: There's a number 7 on the back.
verbInteractions.Examine: It's a picture of this house. The view is from the street, and you recognize two of the trees from the front yard, but the third is missing.
verbInteractions.Take: You take the Polaroid with you.
